deviceNotApproved.title: Sign In Rejected
deviceNotApproved.message: Your request to access this account was rejected by a verified device.

warning.text: Multiple rejections could lead your device to be blacklisted from Criptext.

confirmWaitingApprovalLogin.title: Well, that's odd...
confirmWaitingApprovalLogin.message: Something has happened that is delaying this process.
confirmWaitingApprovalLogin.detail: Do you want to continue waiting?

loginFailed.name: Login error
loginFailed.description:
An error occurred while login. Please try again.

tooManyDevices.name: Too many devices
tooManyDevices.description:
You already have too many active devices. 
From one of your trusted devices remove some inactive device and try again. If you can't access any of your trusted devices, contact support

tooManyRequests.name: Too many requests
tooManyRequests.description:
Too many consecutive attempts.
Please try again in

wrongCredentials.name: Wrong credentials
wrongCredentials.description: Incorrect username or password. Check credentials and try again.

deleteDevices.title: You have reached the device limit (10) on your account
deleteDevices.paragraph: Introduce your password to remove one or more devices.

deleteDevices.title: Remove Devices
deleteDevices.message: You have too many devices. You need to remove {0} device(s) more in orther to continue

deleteDevices.title: Remove Devices
deleteDevices.paragraph: You must remove (2) more devices before signing in.

deleteDevices.title: Session Expired
deleteDevices.paragraph: You've reached the maximum inactivity time permitted. Please sign in again.

200.title: Reset Password
200.paragraph: A reset link was sent to
200.note: The link will be valid for 30 minutes

400.title: No Recovery Email
400.paragraph: Password recovery is impossible as no recovery email was set on your account. For further assistance contact us:

error.title: Reset Password
error.paragraph: Failed to send the Reset password link. Try again

recoveryCode.title: Recovery Code
recoveryCode.message: Please check your recovery email {0} and enter the code that was sent to you
recoveryCode.alreadySent: A code has already been sent to your recovery email {0} in the last hour. Please check your mailbox and enter the code

upgradePlus.title: You need Plus for this
upgradePlus.message: You've reached your maximum devices allowed (2). Upgrade to Plus to get up to 5 devices connected on your account. Otherwise, remove an existing device in order to continue logging in.

errorMessages.emailAddressNotValidCriptext: Not a valid Criptext address or username
